value.title: Using IoT Central with Connected Field Service for Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: This module will focus on using IoT Central with Connected Field Service add-on for Dynamics 365 for Field Service.  The module will walk you through building an IoT Central application and escalating the alerts into Dynamics 365.

value.title: Utilize threat intelligence in Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Utilize threat intelligence in Azure Sentinel

value.title: Create views and templates in Django
value.excerpt: Learn about the templating engine in Django to create dynamic HTML. In this module, you'll create views and use template variables, inheritance, and tags.

value.title: Void detection on Edge devices with Live Video Analytics using own images and video
value.excerpt: This module helps learner to deploy void detection solution using Live Video Analytics and Custom Vision

value.title: Plan for cloud workload protections using Azure Defender
value.excerpt: Plan for cloud workload protections using Azure Defender

value.title: Hunt for threats with Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Hunt for threats with Azure Sentinel

value.title: Extract data from forms with Form Recognizer
value.excerpt: Form Recognizer extracts data at scale to enable the submission of documents in real time, at scale, with accuracy. This module gives users the tools to use the Azure Form Recognizer vision API.

value.title: Write Subqueries in T-SQL
value.excerpt: Write Subqueries in T-SQL

value.title: Introduction to Windows Virtual Desktop in Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Windows Virtual Desktop to deliver remote desktop and remote app experiences in Microsoft Azure.

value.title: Deploy applications by using MSIX app attach for Windows Virtual Desktop
value.excerpt: Learn how to deliver applications using MSIX app attach technology. MSIX app attach is an application delivery technology that separates applications and their state from the operating system and assigns applications to users dynamically.

value.title: Secure a Windows Virtual Desktop deployment
value.excerpt: Introduction to Microsoft security capabilities that can keep your applications and data secure in your Windows Virtual Desktop deployment.

value.title: Accelerating HPC Storage with the Azure FXT Edge Filer | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In high performance computing (HPC) workloads, access to storage matters. In this episode, Scott Hanselman and Ron Hogue discuss the new Azure FXT Edge Filer, a new appliance that creates a powerful cache on-premises connecting network attached storage (NAS) and Azure Blob. value.title: An intro to Azure Cosmos DB JavaScript SDK 2.0 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Chris Anderson joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure Cosmos DB JavaScript SDK 2.0, which adds support for multi-region writes, a new fluent-style object model—making it easier to reference Azure Cosmos DB resources without an explicit URL—and support for promises and other modern JavaScript features.
